ygData.subject: Re: WHAH!
ygData.msgSnippet: ss4songohan2001  wrote: i wanna play everquest! i need a game card number or credit card to play the game. so now i have a everquest trilogy for nothin
ygData.messageBody:
"ss4songohan2001" wrote:

"i wanna play everquest! i need a game card number or credit card to
play the game. so now i have a everquest trilogy for nothin WHAH!"

Umm yeah. If you had read the whole box, you probably would have noticed it says "Valid credit card required." written in bold capital letters on the rear.

If you dont have a credit card, try seeing if a good friend of yours might let you charge it to his/her credit card. Or maybe your parents. Another option would be to open a checking account, at a bank, that has a Visa Check Card instead of a plain ol' debit card. Works just like a credit card but the money just comes directly out of you checking account.
